attributes.action: acknowledge Paganism as a legitimite religion, adding it to official forms, such as the population census, as standard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paganism (and its varients) is the oldest and the seventh most populus religion in the UK but it does not appear on any government or public sector employer forms. Pagans are obliged to tick 'other' boxes on official forms, compelling us to declare our faith in a way which makes it seem subversive and unusual. This creates a culture of distrust in which Pagans may feel discriminated against as a direct result of their faith and may be excluded from certain strains of Public Sector employment (e.g. religious schools) due to our religion appearing dangerous through a lack of understanding and acceptance.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to acknowledge Paganism as a legitimite religion, adding it to official forms, such as the population census, as standard..

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=PaganForms
